description: This is to acquire a He-Cryostat system.
full_summary:
## He-Cryostat System Tender Opportunity

### Announcement Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3764705784-Doc3834915321
* **Publication Date**: January 19th, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 6th, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Number**: 1

### Procurement Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3764705784
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Trade Regions**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Natural Resources Canada is soliciting bids for a He-Cryostat system to be used at Quebec. The acquisition includes delivery, as detailed in the RFP document.

### Bid Requirements

Please note that this bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 23331-230452 dated November 25, 2022, with a closing on December 22, 2022. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by 2:00 PM EST on February 6, 2023. Submissions received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

If you wish to learn more about this request or require additional information, please contact Rafael Uribe from SPAC/PSPC:
* Email: [rafael.uribe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rafael.uribe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not provided
* Fax: Not provided
* Location: Not provided

You may download the RFP document from the following link:

* Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15175857?extsite=MTUxNzU4NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15175857?extsite=MTUxNzU4NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)F

### Key Dates

* Publication Date: January 19th, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: February 6th, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
